name: Visionary
blurb: Sees future possibilities and patterns quickly.

blurb: Breaks problems down and validates with data.

name: Empathic
blurb: Understands people; builds trust fast.

name: Builder

name: Strategic
blurb: Finds leverage points that move the whole system.

name: Communicator

name: Connector

name: Steadfast
blurb: Dependable; calm under pressure.

name: Innovator

name: Organizer
blurb: Creates order, flow, and clean handoffs.

name: Executor

name: Numerate

name: Creative
blurb: Generates novel combinations and fresh angles.

name: Servant-Leader

name: Resilient
blurb: Bounces back stronger from adversity.

name: Disciplined
blurb: Builds compounding habits; shows up daily.

name: Adaptable
blurb: Shifts gracefully as situations change.

name: Detail-Attentive
blurb: Catches small issues that protect big outcomes.

name: Systems Thinker
blurb: Understands interactions and second-order effects.

name: Mission-Driven
blurb: Purpose fuels persistence and focus.

name: Relational

name: Calibrated Risk Taker
blurb: Acts boldly with safeguards and contingencies.

name: Ethical

name: Customer-Obsessed

name: Self-Starter

name: Diligent

name: Storyteller

name: Collaborative

name: Mentor

name: Humble

name: Decisive

name: Optimistic-Realist

name: Craftsperson

name: Curator

name: Encourager

name: Time-Wise
